data.fullContent: During World War II he accepted invitations by the Nazis to conduct in Germany. After the war people in Holland were very cross that he had done this, and he was forbidden to conduct in Holland for six years. He said that he had only conducted in Germany for the sake of the musicians.
data.answer: 第二次世界大战期间，他接受了纳粹的邀请在德国指挥。战争结束后，荷兰人对他的所作所为感到非常愤怒，禁止他在荷兰六年内从事任何行为。他说他只是为了音乐家才在德国指挥的。
